<small>Also see: **<big>[[H5619|סָקַל]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַם‎</span>] **verb** ==stone, kill by stoning== (denominative ? compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סקל‎</span>; or originally = ***throw, hurl*** ? Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַם‎</span> ***throw at*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***throw stones at, stone***, also (from accompaniment of stone-throwing) ***revile, curse***, compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***curse***, [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Held 2.111, 250</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְגַם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stone***); &amp;; **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָֽגְמוּ‎</span> [[Lev.24.14|Lev 24:14]] + 2 t., suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְגָמֻהוּ‎</span> [[Deut.21.21|Deut 21:21]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגְמוּ‎</span> [[Lev.20.16|Lev 20:16]]; [[Lev.20.27|Lev 20:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּר‎</span>, [[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]] + 4 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגְמֻהוּ‎</span> [[Lev.20.2|Lev 20:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּר‎</span> [[2Chr.24.21|2Chr 24:21]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגוֺם‎</span> [[Lev.24.16|Lev 24:16]]; [[Num.15.35|Num 15:35]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְגּוֺם‎</span> [[Num.14.10|Num 14:10]] &amp; ***stone***, with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאֲבָנִים‎</span> [[Deut.21.21|Deut 21:21]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Num.14.10|Num 14:10]]; [[Num.15.35|Num 15:35]]; [[Num.15.36|Num 15:36]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאֶבֶן‎</span> [[Ezek.16.40|Ezek 16:40]]; [[Lev.20.2|Lev 20:2]]; [[Lev.20.27|Lev 20:27]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); + accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבֶן‎</span> [[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Lev.24.23|Lev 24:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.24.21|2Chr 24:21]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person + accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבֶן‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.18|1Kgs 12:18]] = [[2Chr.10.18|2Chr 10:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person + accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבֶן‎</span> [[Ezek.23.47|Ezek 23:47]] with accusative of person alone [[Lev.24.14|Lev 24:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person alone, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגוֺם יִרְגְּמוּבֿוֺ‎</span> v[[Lev.24.16|Lev 24:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). &amp;; Synonym  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סקל‎</span> q. v.
